5938271_style_6: The flexible bronchoscope was introduced through the 8.5 ETT. Inspection revealed a fungating mass in the RUL obstructing the superior and anterior segments. TBNA (5 passes) and forceps biopsies (6 samples) were taken from the RUL. A second lesion in the LLL superior segment was localized with radial EBUS; TBNA (4 passes) and transbronchial biopsies (5 samples) were obtained. BAL was performed in the LLL. Moderate bleeding was controlled with epinephrine. ROSE confirmed malignancy in the RUL.
